headline: ON Semiconductor Corporation (ON): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on ON Semiconductor Corporation (ON) on Substack by Charly AI. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on ON. ON Semiconductor Corporation (ON)’s share was trading at $55.61 as of Jan 21st. ON’s trailing and forward P/E were 13.80 and 13.14 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
